title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Control of Fishing for Salmon
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Control of Fishing for Salmon 

(Amendment) Order 2022.

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order “Order of 2021” means the Control of Fishing for Salmon 

Order 2021 (S.I. No 102 2021).
text_norm: 2 order order 2021 mean control fishing salmon order 2021 (s.i 102 2021)

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: 3. The Order of 2021 is amended –
text_raw:
3. The Order of 2021 is amended – 

(a) by the substitution of Schedule 1 to this Order for Schedule 1 to 

the Order of 2021, and 

(b) by the substitution of Schedule 2 to this Order for Schedule 2 to 

the Order of 2021. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th March, 2022.

title: 1977 (S.I. No. 30 of 1977) (as adapted by the Communications, Climate Action
heading: Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons
text_raw:
1. 

Details of number of fish caught in last 3 salmon fishing seasons 

(a) 

(b) 

If you held a salmon net fishing licence for any of the 
last 3 salmon fishing seasons, indicate in the table below 
the year or years in which you held the licence and the 
numbers of fish caught. Alternatively, you may tick the 
box at the top of the table for the number of fish caught 
and IFI will enter these details onto the form from your 
logbook returns during those years. 

If you have not held a salmon net fishing licence for any 
of the last 3 salmon fishing seasons, but were authorised 
and named on a licence held by another person, 
complete the table below giving appropriate details of 
the licence holder and the number of fish caught. 

Table 

Please tick if you wish these details 
to be taken from your logbook 
returns 

( ) 

Number 
salmon caught 

of 

Number of sea 
trout over 40cm 
caught 

Year Licence holder or authorised 

person 

(Please state which) 

1 

2 

3 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2. 

Declaration 

[109] 5 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

I have/have not held a salmon licence issued by the 
Foyle Carlingford and Irish Lights Commission during 
the last 3 years (If so give particulars). 

I hereby apply for a salmon fishing licence to operate a 
___________________ (state type of net etc.) during the 
____________________ season in the ______________ 
fishery district. 

I wish to have the following person authorised and 
named to operate the licence in my absence during the 
____________ season in accordance with the Control of 
Fishing for Salmon (Amendment) Order 2022. 

Name: ___________________________ Date of birth: _____________ 

Address:__________________________________________________ 

Tel. No.:_________________________ 

Signature of applicant:__________________ Date:________________ 

Part 2 

CERTIFICATE 

This certificate must be completed in every application 

I, ___________________ certify that Mr/Mrs/Ms _______________________ 

who is known to me, is ordinarily resident in the address stated in Part I and 
signed this form in my presence. 

Official Stamp of 

Witness* 

Signature: _______________________ 

 *Position: _______________________ 

 Address: ________________________ 

 _________________________ 

*Note: The signature of the applicant for a fishing licence must be witnessed 
by either a Peace Commissioner, Clergyman, Fishery Officer, or member of the 
Garda Síochána in whose fishery district the applicant resides. The latest date 
for receipt of completed application forms is 8 April 2022 at 5:00 p.m. 
Completed application forms should be sent to: 

River Basin District Director, 

Inland Fisheries Ireland 

_______________________________ 

_______________________________ 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [109]

CERTIFICATE OF APPLICANT AND IF APPLICABLE, OF PERSON 
AUTHORISED TO OPERATE THE LICENCE.
